content.question: Write a thesis statement that you might use for an essay that analyzes how that manipulation contributes to an interpretation of the work as a whole. Write a paragraph in support of your thesis that uses at least one piece of evidence from the text.

frqParts.text: Write a thesis statement that you might use for an essay that analyzes how that manipulation contributes to an interpretation of the work as a whole. Write a paragraph in support of your thesis that uses at least one piece of evidence from the text.

skill.text: Skill 3.E: Explain the function of a significant event or related set of significant events in a plot.
